Posts.Content: kalexander26 wrote: My friend Michele K just had her 3rd of 6 chemo treatments - food does not taste good to her. She is on a very limited diet now becuase of diverticulitis and gall bladder issues. She was wondering when the foods she *can* eat will taste good again after the chemo treatments have stopped. Nothing tastes good to her now. Kimberly Alexander Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: When will food taste good again? kalexander26 ruthbru
